summary: Removed unused imports from three wallet component test files to fix TS6133 errors

fixes_applied.fix: Removed 'import React from react' and removed 'waitFor' from testing-library import
Removed 'import React from react' and removed 'fireEvent' from testing-library import

root_causes: Modern React (17+) with JSX transform doesn't require React to be in scope for JSX
Test imports included utilities that were never actually used in the test code
